short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily stock price updates on a tab! The extension reminds you to check changes, helping determine if it's a good time to invest.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A convenient window for viewing stock prices quickly! This extension works in tandem with with our stock watching website to provide a daily reminder to check stocks of interest. If you are not into investing but want a reminder to view stocks daily, this extension is perfect for you!
